title: 2. Lei leh vanten in aw chhuah ru
lyrics:
Lei leh van ten in aw chhuah r'u,
Hnam ze tinreng lawma auvin;
Kiltin leh ram tin thangkhawk se,
'Lalpa Pathian, Lalber,' tiin.

A thutiam rinawm nghet tak chu,
A finna famkim thil ruat nen;
Ringhlel leh do ngam tu nge awm?
Lalpa Pathian, Lalber a ni.

Thil siam zawng zawngten fak rawh se,
A thu, dikin a thianghlim si;
Roreltu fing leh dik tak chu,
Lalpa Pathian, Lalber a ni.

Lal leh Pathian khat hnuaia mi'n,
Chawimawina hla ropui sain,
Lei chung leh vante nghawr vel se.
Lalpa Pathian, Lalber fakin.
